channel.title: Gluttonous: SYS-CON Media and Open Source Spam

item.title: SYS-CON Media and Open Source Spam
item.description:
I started getting announcements from SYS-CON Media from an email naming itself as “Enterprise Open Source Buyer’s Guide” just after Rails Conf. There’s a link at the bottom to “unsubscribe from all SYS-CON Media mailing lists, including special offers and your digital edition and newsletter subscriptions”. I’ve gone through this process four times. Now I’m getting frusterated.

Does anyone know who SYS-CON Media is and how I can get off their list? Are other people who went to RailsConf feeling the pain?
item.author: kev

item.title: "SYS-CON Media and Open Source Spam" by Matt Baron
"SYS-CON Media and Open Source Spam" by choonkeat
"SYS-CON Media and Open Source Spam" by Steve Longdo
item.description:
SYS-CON is the publisher/distributor of everyone’s favorite magazine, JDJ, Java Developer’s Journal.

I wish you luck in your quest to get the emails stopped. I’ve been getting that magazine and spam from them for years now.
